title: Sewing Instruction Book, "Sewing Book, I.E.A., N.Y.", 1886
medium: Medium: embroidered linen cover, ink on paper, fabric samples, metal fasteners
description: Small, bound sewing instruction book with hand-embroidered cover in red thread on natural linen. Inside the book, each left leaf contains a hand-written description of the sewing technique and its use. On the right, a small sample of the technique as executed by the student is attached to the page with small brass fasteners.

exhibitions.title: Hella Jongerius Selects: Works from the Permanent Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Sewing Instruction Book, "Sewing Book, I.E.A., N.Y.", 1886.
1886. Medium: embroidered linen cover, ink on paper, fabric samples, metal fasteners. Gift of Anonymous Donor. 1934-18-1.
